contained.name: is_external
contained.title: is_external
contained.description: Computed from the value of the `_uri_` attribute: True if  the data is stored externally to the record, as indicated by `_uri_`. A copy may also be stored internally, in which case `_is_expanded_` is also true.

contained.name: is_inline
contained.title: is_inline
contained.description: Computed from the value of the data attribute. True if  the  data is stored  in  expanded  form, ie within the EHR itself.

contained.name: is_compressed
contained.title: is_compressed
contained.description: Computed from the value of the `_compression_algorithm_` attribute: True if  the  data is stored in compressed form.

contained.name: has_integrity_check
contained.title: has_integrity_check
contained.description: Computed from the value of the `_integrity_check_algorithm_` attribute: True if an integrity check has been computed.

name: DV_MULTIMEDIA
title: DV_MULTIMEDIA
description: A specialisation of `DV_ENCAPSULATED` for audiovisual and bio-signal types. Includes further metadata relating to multimedia types which are not applicable to other subtypes of `DV_ENCAPSULATED`.

element.short: A specialisation of `DV_ENCAPSULATED` for audiovisual and bio-signal types.
element.definition: A specialisation of `DV_ENCAPSULATED` for audiovisual and bio-signal types. Includes further metadata relating to multimedia types which are not applicable to other subtypes of `DV_ENCAPSULATED`.

constraint.human: Media type valid must be present
Compression algorithm validity must be present
Integrity check validity must be present
Integrity check algorithm validity must be present
Size valid must satisfy range constraints

element.short: Text to display in lieu of multimedia display/replay.
element.definition: Text to display in lieu of multimedia display/replay.

element.short: URI reference to electronic information stored outside the record as a file, database entry etc, if supplied as a reference.
element.definition: URI reference to electronic information stored outside the record as a file, database entry etc, if supplied as a reference.

element.short: The actual data found at `_uri_`, if supplied inline.
element.definition: The actual data found at `_uri_`, if supplied inline.

element.short: Data media type coded from openEHR code set  media types  (interface for the IANA MIME types code set).
element.definition: Data media type coded from openEHR code set  media types  (interface for the IANA MIME types code set).

element.short: Compression type, a coded value from the openEHR Integrity check code set.
element.definition: Compression type, a coded value from the openEHR Integrity check code set. Void means no compression.

element.short: Type of integrity check, a coded value from the openEHR `Integrity check` code set.
element.definition: Type of integrity check, a coded value from the openEHR `Integrity check` code set.

element.short: The thumbnail for this item, if one exists; mainly for graphics formats.
element.definition: The thumbnail for this item, if one exists; mainly for graphics formats.

element.short: Original size in bytes of unencoded encapsulated data.
element.definition: Original size in bytes of unencoded encapsulated data. I.e. encodings such as base64, hexadecimal etc do not change the value of this attribute.
